title: Bachelor: Never Before. Never Again.
overview: A documentary that explores the story of Bachelor, Puerto Rico’s groundbreaking discotheque, which operated from 1975 to 1992 and defined an era in the island’s nightlife. Through the testimonies of figures such as Pablo Flores, Sonya Cortés, Choco Orta, and Barbara Herr, it revives a space that nurtured multiple trajectories in culture, art, and LGBTQ+ visibility in Puerto Rico.
